# X-UI Component Library
# Auto-generated on 2026-01-12T11:28:46.572Z
# https://x-ui.xdev.asia

## Overview
X-UI is a modern UI component library by XDEV Asia for React.js.

## Installation
```bash
npm install @xdev-asia/x-ui-react
# or
pnpm add @xdev-asia/x-ui-react
```

## Quick Start
```tsx
import { Button, Input, Card } from '@xdev-asia/x-ui-react';
import '@xdev-asia/x-ui-react/styles.css';

function App() {
  return (
    <Card>
      <Input placeholder="Enter text" />
      <Button>Submit</Button>
    </Card>
  );
}
```

## Documentation URLs
- Getting Started: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/
- Theming: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/theming/
- Colors & Tokens: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/colors/
- MCP Setup: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/getting-started/mcp/

## Components

### Forms
- Button: Trigger actions with customizable buttons
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/button/
- IconButton: Icon-only buttons for common actions
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/iconbutton/
- Input: Text input field with validation support
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/input/
- TextArea: Multi-line text input
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/textarea/
- Select: Dropdown selection component
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/select/
- Checkbox: Binary choice input
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/checkbox/
- Radio: Single selection from multiple options
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/radio/
- Switch: Toggle between two states
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/switch/
- DatePicker: Date selection with calendar UI
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/datepicker/

### Data Display
- Avatar: User profile pictures and initials
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/avatar/
- Badge: Status indicators and counts
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/badge/
- Card: Container for related content
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/card/
- Tag: Labels for categorization
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/tag/
- Table: Tabular data display
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/table/

### Layout
- Box: Flexible container component
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/box/
- Stack: Vertical/horizontal layout
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/stack/
- Grid: CSS Grid layout system
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/grid/
- Divider: Visual separator
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/divider/

### Feedback
- Progress: Progress indicators
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/progress/
- Spinner: Loading spinner
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/spinner/
- Skeleton: Content placeholder
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/skeleton/
- Toast: Temporary notifications
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/toast/
- Tooltip: Contextual information popup
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/tooltip/

### Navigation
- Tabs: Tabbed navigation
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/tabs/
- Pagination: Page navigation
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/pagination/

### Overlay
- Modal: Dialog windows
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/modal/
- Drawer: Slide-in panels
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/drawer/
- Dropdown: Dropdown menus
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/dropdown/
- Popover: Contextual overlays
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/popover/
- Accordion: Collapsible content sections
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/accordion/
- AlertDialog: Confirmation dialogs
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/alertdialog/
- BottomSheet: Mobile bottom sheets
  URL: https://x-ui.xdev.asia/docs/components/bottomsheet/

## Package Information
- Package: @xdev-asia/x-ui-react
- Core: @xdev-asia/x-ui-core
- GitHub: https://github.com/xdev-asia/x-ui

## MCP Server
Install in your AI client:
```
npx -y @xdev-asia/x-ui-mcp@latest
```
